general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages. Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Apply sprinkler irrigation to bring down the heat effect. Irrigate the crop promptly.

advisory: Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are critical. Avoid water deficit during these stages.
Top-dress with 4% potassium to protect crop from water scarcity during summer. Irrigate frequently during hot months.
Irrigate the crop promptly to meet increased water requirement.
Apply 1g Streptocyclin in 10 liter water in root zone to prevent wilting.
Install pheromone traps for pest management. Spray neem-based pesticide for insect control.
Mulch coconut leaves around the tree to reduce water loss.
Cover newly planted seedlings with paper caps during the day.
Harvest fingerlings from shallow ponds if water temperature rises to 30Â°C.
Check migration of caterpillars. Dust with Chlorpyriphos around the field.
Check migration of caterpillars. Dust with Chlorpyriphos around the field.
Cut the tops leaving 2.0-2.5 cm above bulb after harvesting. Dry in well-ventilated room.
Spray insecticides to control mango hoppers. Use Imidacloprid or Thiamethoxam for effective control.
Treat okra seeds with Imidacloprid before sowing to prevent whitefly infestation.
